DOC.brief_title: A Study Examine Glycemic Response Corn Soy Tortillas Healthy Individuals
DOC.detailed_description: Soybeans important crop Canada , approximately 10 % soybean production Manitoba . Soybeans grown primarily oil . The press cake remain following oil extraction good source protein contain bioactive ingredient isoflavones . The press cake ground flour ( soy flour ) use food product . For example , finely ground flour use infant formula well meat dairy substitute . This research examine application soy flour food product corn tortilla . Tortillas staple food several culture widely use make taco , burrito , enchilada . These food gain significant segment North American fast food restaurant industry . From health point view , addition soy flour corn tortilla improve nutritional profile tortilla presence soy protein , dietary fibre bioactive component potential yield health benefit . It hypothesize addition soy flour corn tortilla low glycemic index . The glycemic index describe potential food increase blood glucose post-prandially relation amount available carbohydrate glucose solution . Consumption low glycemic index food help achieve good glycemic control individual type 2 diabetes . Recent meta-analyses report consumption high glycemic index food associate high risk coronary heart disease breast cancer woman . The purpose research investigate whether different level soy flour corn tortilla influence glycemic response . This information form basis develop food product glycemic management type 2 diabetes reduce risk chronic disease . This single site , double-blind , randomize , control study design examine glycemic response corn soy tortilla healthy individual recruit 10 eligible volunteer study visit research clinic 6 separate visit glycemic testing . At visit , one following product consume : ) 296 ml ( ~1 cup ) oral glucose solution ; ii ) 296 ml ( ~1 cup ) oral glucose solution duplicate assessment per standard glycemic index test protocol ; iii ) corn tortilla ; iv ) corn tortilla low amount soy flour ; v ) corn tortilla moderate amount soy flour ; vi ) corn tortilla make high amount soy flour .
DOC.criteria: Male female , great equal 18 less equal 40 year age ; Normal blood lipid profile ( total cholesterol , LDLcholesterol , HDL cholesterol , triglyceride ) glycated hemoglobin < 6 % ; Body mass index ( BMI ) 20 30 ; Stable regime past 3 month take vitamin mineral/dietary/herbal supplement ; Agree eat soybean ( edamame ) soybased food , consume soy isoflavone supplement participate study ; Willing comply protocol requirement ; Willing provide inform consent . Allergies corn soy flour corn soy product ; Presence clinically diagnose disease affect circulatory , respiratory , immune , skeletal , urinary , muscular , endocrine , digestive , nervous reproductive system require medical treatment ; Taking prescribed medication ( exception birth control ) within last 3 month , take supplement affect glycemic control within last 3 month ; Cigarette/cigar smoking , current within last 6 month ; Current ( within last 30 day ) bacterial , viral fungal infection , take overthecounter medication within past 72 h ; Pregnancy lactation .
